headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Premium Deluxe Motorsport Showroom
content:
Pay Simeon a visit at the Premium Deluxe Motorsport Showroom and walk among this week's featured vehicles â€“ feel free to take any of them on a test drive or buy them outright:

- The Rune Cheburek (50% off) painted Classic Black and customized with the Rusted livery
- A Classic Bright Orange Benefactor Streiter (30% off)
- The Karin Calico GTF (30% off) in a Pearlescent White paint job and Tribal Purple Halftone livery

And More! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
